website_summaries.verdict: The $399 HP LaserJet Pro 400 M401dw bundles all of HP's latest technologies into a tight package, but the 3.5-inch touch-screen display doesn't offer enough unique features to warrant the price jump to $400, especially compared with competing devices. Small businesses and home offices shopping for a reliable monochrome laser printer for quick prints should ignore the HP LaserJet M401dw's inflated price tag and look for a better deal.
pros: The HP LaserJet Pro 400 M401dw's direct USB port, wireless connectivity, and remote printing features offer a variety of ways to interact with the printer
cons: HP Smart Install only works with Windows, and the flimsy touch-screen display impedes usability

customer_reviews.title: Super simple and great
customer_reviews.text: I haven't purchased an HP product for a while – mostly because they were requiring crazy software installations with their products for a while, and I finally gave up – but when I needed a good B/W network printer for a small business environment, it seemed like I should try them again. Great decision. We had this thing up and running in about 15 minutes, and it has been smooth sailing since then. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Tor Lundgren

customer_reviews.title: HP 400 M401 DN Laserjet printer great
customer_reviews.text: This prouduct is completely terrific. Have not had any problems, no paper jams, no error messages, and does a great job doing double sided copies automatically once set up. So far I love this thing. I'll never go back to inkjet, especially kodak. Unlike some other reviews I do not have a problem with the sleeping printer waking by itself to do print jobs I request either wi if or USB. This is the first Laserjet I ever owned but by far the best printer I ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: bud

customer_reviews.title: Fast.  Excellent quality.  Auto-duplexing.
customer_reviews.text: Love. Love. Love this printer! Fast. Excellent quality. Auto-duplexing (two sided pages.) This is replacing my ancient boat anchor, a HP LaserJet 4Plus. I don't expect this one to last 20+ years as it's not as heavy duty. Considering today's printers are "throw away technology", this is a very affordable, quality, printer.
customer_reviews.author: LOUIS SAAD III

customer_reviews.title: Sets up in a jiffy!
customer_reviews.text: I'm off to a great start with the M401DN- I've set up a lot of hp LaserJets over the years, and the touch screen feature makes this model the easiest to set up yet- I'm pleased with all other aspects, as compared to this model's predecessors- The price is right, and the cost of toner is comparable-
customer_reviews.author: Michael Davis

customer_reviews.title: HP my got to printer
customer_reviews.text: I have a HP LaserJet 4 at work it was reassigned to me used probably 20 years ago. Every year I pass on a new printer, since this one has never failed me and is a proven workhorse. I purchased the HP 400 M40 1DN Laserjet Pro Printer for the homeoffice, could not be more pleased. Was delivered in record time. Overall great experience!
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: What a bargan!
customer_reviews.text: This printer is fantastic! Setup was easy, went right into my network. I'm using it at home although we also have the same printer at my office. Quiet, fast, lots of nice features (Duplex printing, printing via email to name a few). Seems like one that will last for quite some time. Great Price!! Delivered quickly. My last office class HP printer lasted me about 20 years. I am recommending this one to all my friends who are in the printer market.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product
customer_reviews.text: The product works without a problem. I intend to purchase from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Photodana

customer_reviews.title: Hewlett Packard 400 M401DN
customer_reviews.text: Bought this printer for a bank VP. He loves it. Set up was easy. Prints quickly and quietly and has good print quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Lynn Rotherham

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have had my printer for a few years and have not had any problems with it. It is reliable and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Mary I.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - Perfect for a Small Business
customer_reviews.text: I love this printer - I'm so excited to have it. I used to own a HP P3005dn, which was very large and took up a lot of space - this printer is compact & fast! It's fairly quiet and has so many capabilities. The shipping was SO fast - ordered Monday, arrived in Indiana on Thursday afternoon. A MUST HAVE for a small business.
customer_reviews.author: BrewerDental

customer_reviews.title: Good office printer. Does not allow non-HP catridges.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this printer for office daily printing needs. It works great and we have no problem with it, easy setup, no issue. This printer absolutely does not allow any non-HP cartridges, you must and can only use HP brand cartridges, which do not last long. Couple months ago, I moved this printer from office to home office, unable to reconnect, until I did a new setup, then it worked right away.
customer_reviews.author: macbc

customer_reviews.title: Used everyday in a University advising office
customer_reviews.text: We work this printer pretty hard. And it continually works great. Nothing fancy but does the job well. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenifer M. Swindle

customer_reviews.title: HP wireless network printer
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Very easy to set up for my office with the enclosed driver. Print quality is outstanding and the speed of the printer is more than adequate for our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Krueger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: using it as a back up printer for our office. works well
customer_reviews.author: CPANT

customer_reviews.title: Usual HP but post help horrible for web set up
customer_reviews.text: I bought HP b/c I had HP printers are solid. But the HP web support is horrible. None. Its hard to set up the e-printing. HP is inaccessible.
customer_reviews.author: RunningKat

customer_reviews.title: a good printer...
customer_reviews.text: been using this for a while. Quite, quick and reliable thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Tanasi Rider

customer_reviews.title: Died after 14 months.
customer_reviews.text: Printer died after 14 months of normal use. 59.X Error. Hp said this is due to the motors failing. 1 year warranty had just expired.
customer_reviews.author: David E.

customer_reviews.title: Good printer
customer_reviews.text: Does everything as advertised. Easy to install and use for multiple stations. Two trays is a bonus Relatively compact and quiet
customer_reviews.author: john Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Loved it and bought 3 more !!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this printer and vendor so much I purchased three more !!
customer_reviews.author: Troy R.

customer_reviews.title: HP 400 M401DN Laser Printer
customer_reviews.text: The product came sooner than expected and was a God-send to us. I'm in the tax business and my HP 2015 failed me during the last two weeks of tax season! So, I ordered the HP 400 and it works beautifully!
customer_reviews.author: Raymond D. Nations

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Printer
customer_reviews.text: This replaced an older networked HP printer. It is smaller and much faster than the older printer I had. Very easy to set up and use also. I would definitely recommend this printer to anyone considering purchasing it.
customer_reviews.author: DebbieDuch

customer_reviews.title: HP Printer
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfectly serviceable black & white HP printer. It can print on both sides and does the job. I have nothing more to add.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Adler

customer_reviews.title: HP 400 M401DN Laserjet Pro Printer
customer_reviews.text: We previously had an HP laserjet printer which lasted 15 years, thereby giving us excellent service. Therefore we decided to once again purchase an HP laserjet printer to replace the old one. HP provides a quality product at a reasonable price. We were also impressed in that we ordered the printer on a Friday morning, it was shipped that afternoon, and we received it on Monday. That is awesome service.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Just received
customer_reviews.text: This this came this week and was installed today. Am excited to give it a try and see what it will do. This replaces an old LaserJet printer that my son gave me.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jo Rainer

customer_reviews.title: Great for personal use.
customer_reviews.text: Great printer for the money. Easy to setup and easy to use. the M401DN handles the majority of jobs without a problem. the multipurpose tray 1 is designed for light duty and cannot be replaced easily. If you print a lot of envelopes I suggest you upgrade to M601 and buy an envelope feeder attachment. The Fuser is very difficult to replace and would need a bit of know how to get done. I will definitely purchase this printer again for personal or very light office use.
customer_reviews.author: Chad R.

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup, fast, reliable, low cost
customer_reviews.text: I am a reasonably competent user, but not a technology expert. I set it up to work on my wired network using the enclosed CD. Including my desktop, laptop, and also my IPad, it took about 25 minutes, and it works perfectly. Switches between the laptop (which is attached wirelessly to the network) and the desktop (wired) without hesitation. IPad app works well also. I couldn't be more pleased. And for $250 with duplex and network connection, can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Bob L

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY THE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: THE PRINTER'S OVEN IS DEFECTIVE AND AROUND 40000 PAGES IT STOPS PRODUCING TWO SIDED COPIES. HP KNOWS ABOUT THE PROBLEM BUT WANTS TO BARGAIN FOR THE REPAIRS AND HAVE YOU ESSENTIALLY BUY THE PRODUCT ONE MORE TIME. TERRIBLE PRODUCT NOTHING TO DO WITH THE P2XXX SERIES PRODUCTS WHICH WERE WORKHORSES. TOO BAD FOR HP AS IT LOSE THE MARKET AGAIN.....
customer_reviews.author: K P.

customer_reviews.title: DOA
customer_reviews.text: The machine was inoperable on arrival. I called HP three times, received little help, and am packaging it up to go. The machine said that there was a jam in the cartridge area; there was not. No one from HP could help at all.
customer_reviews.author: Austinite

customer_reviews.title: Good classroom printer
customer_reviews.text: This printer was placed in my classroom so that students could print from iPads. Yes, they've been successful but it isn't the fastest. It tends to stall when printing 2 sided, so I don't even make this an option for students when there is more than 2 students that need to print. I love the fact that toner isn't going to take my entire classroom budget! I'm thinking of buying one for home.
customer_reviews.author: JUST keepin' it SheREAL

customer_reviews.title: Printer paper size error
customer_reviews.text: hello it is a good printer as long as you print A4! But if you're printing 8.5x13 inch papar, very often i get a stuck paper inside! i update and changed driver , but nothing works till now! if somebody has a advice for me, please write me! thanks
customer_reviews.author: Egon Kehler

customer_reviews.title: bad sensor. Warranty expired after 1 year
customer_reviews.text: Failed after 19 months! bad sensor. Warranty expired after 1 year.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Greve

customer_reviews.title: A solid and fast printer
customer_reviews.text: Bought this one for my office and runs great for three months. Very fast and never had a problem. I guess this printer is an upgraded version from the previous one.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy

customer_reviews.title: HP cheaps out
customer_reviews.text: I cannot review the quality of the printer because HP decided not to include a $2 USB cable which is necessary for either wireless or wired setup. Ordered it on Amazon. HP - do you wonder why your company languishes? I will update this once I get my USB cable -- Apple stores don't even sell these anymore.
customer_reviews.author: SOCRATES

product_meta.title: Hewlett Packard 400 M401DN Laserjet Pro Printer
feature_bullets: Superior productivity, increased mobility: Print from virtually anywhere, using HP ePrint.
Web-connected ease of use: Use business apps and the 3.5-inch (8.89 cm) color touchscreen to access and print from the Web. Use the easy-access USB port to print from a flash drive.

Professional-quality output for a great value: Produce professional-quality business prints with bold, crisp text and sharp images. Depend on a printer with up to 3000-page recommended monthly page volumethe ideal fit for reliable printing.
Reduced environmental impact: · Reduce paper use by up to 50% with automatic two-sided printing. Reduce energy use with HP Auto-On/Auto-Off Technology.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars51 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
